description:
Sorted! The addictive sorting game!

INTRODUCTORY OFFER PRICE FOR LIMITED TIME!

★★★★★
I love it... it's frustratingly addictive! 

★★★★★ 
It's great that you can play random games once you've completed all the levels.

☆ SO WHAT IS SORTED!?

'Sorted!' is a challenging and addictive game that combines skill, co-ordination and concentration. Complete the levels by sorting the coloured balls into the corresponding coloured areas. Drag the walls up and down, allowing the required balls to pass through the gap/s. Sound simple? It might be harder than you think! 

☆ KEY FEATURES

✔ 39 challenging levels (try to get 3 stars on all of them)
✔ Random level option (for a unique level each time)
✔ HD graphics for HP Touchpad
✔ Try to beat your high score on each level

We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, concerns, please email us at support@innivo.com
